programme.desc: A special agent recruits former models Derek Zoolander and Hansel to save the world's most beautiful people from a deadly plot.

programme.title: Bottoms
programme.desc: Unpopular best friends PJ and Josie start a high school fight club to meet girls and lose their virginity. They soon find themselves in over their heads when the most popular students start beating each other up in the name of self-defense.

programme.title: A Good Person
programme.desc: After surviving an unimaginable tragedy, a woman emerges from recovery with an opioid addiction and unresolved grief. However, her unlikely friendship with her would-be father-in-law gives her a fighting chance to put her life back together.

programme.title: Blame It on Rio
programme.desc: A middle-aged coffee broker (Michael Caine) eyes his partner's (Joseph Bologna) nubile teenage daughter (Michelle Johnson) on vacation in Brazil.

programme.title: Return of the Seven
programme.desc: The man in black (Yul Brynner) forms a new Magnificent Seven, to save Mexican farmers from slave labor.

programme.title: Return of the Seven
programme.desc: The man in black (Yul Brynner) forms a new Magnificent Seven, to save Mexican farmers from slave labor.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity 3
programme.desc: A videographer becomes obsessed with finding the source of disturbing late-night noises in his home and discovers its terrifying origin.

programme.title: Unseen
programme.desc: Sam, a gas station clerk, receives a random call from Emily, a nearly blind woman who's running from her murderous ex in the woods. Using a phone, Sam becomes Emily's only chance for survival as she guides the terrified woman through a video call.

programme.title: The Town That Dreaded Sundown
programme.desc: A masked maniac terrorizes the same small community where a murderer known as the Phantom Killer struck decades earlier.

programme.title: A Fistful of Dynamite
programme.desc: A thief and a dynamite-tossing Irish revolutionary inadvertently become embroiled in the Mexican Revolution.

programme.title: Dressed to Kill
programme.desc: A psychiatrist (Michael Caine), a prostitute (Nancy Allen) and the son of a slain woman (Angie Dickinson) seek a Manhattan slasher.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: A wealthy womanizer (Tom Cruise) has trouble distinguishing dreams from reality after a car accident leaves him disfigured.

programme.title: Hoodlum
programme.desc: Mobster Ellsworth "Bumpy" Johnson (Laurence Fishburne) vies with rival Dutch Schultz (Tim Roth) for control of illegal gambling in 1930s Harlem.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: An aging lawman (Tommy Lee Jones) reflects on his past and laments a changing world while trying to find and protect a hunter who took the cash from a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: Basic Instinct
programme.desc: A woman suspected of murdering her lover with an ice pick ensnares a San Francisco cop in a web of lust and deceit.

programme.title: The Craft
programme.desc: Teen misfits befriend a suicidal newcomer and strike back at their tormentors with witchcraft in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder
programme.desc: A Vietnam POW (William Devane) comes home to Texas and soon, with his buddy (Tommy Lee Jones), must avenge his slain family.

programme.title: When Worlds Collide
programme.desc: A pilot (Richard Derr), his girlfriend (Barbara Rush) and lottery winners escape by rocket to another planet before a star hits Earth.

programme.title: Under the Gun
programme.desc: Firsthand accounts from parents of Sandy Hook victims, expert commentary and statistics reveal the state of American gun violence and gun control laws.

programme.title: Under the Gun
programme.desc: Firsthand accounts from parents of Sandy Hook victims, expert commentary and statistics reveal the state of American gun violence and gun control laws.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: With a game, an Italian Jew (Roberto Benigni) shields his son (Giorgio Cantarini) from Nazi horrors in a concentration camp during World War II.

programme.title: The Madness of King George
programme.desc: The 18th-century British monarch (Nigel Hawthorne) loves his devoted queen (Helen Mirren) but illness dramatically affects his mind.

programme.title: The Rage: Carrie 2
programme.desc: After her best friend commits suicide, an unpopular girl (Emily Bergl) discovers she has telekinetic powers and uses them to seek revenge on her humiliators.

programme.title: Flight of the Intruder
programme.desc: Two Navy pilots (Willem Dafoe, Brad Johnson) hatch a rogue mission to bomb Hanoi with a special low-altitude plane.

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: An American major (Jean-Claude Van Damme) flies to Hong Kong for an outlawed martial-arts contest called the Kumite.

programme.title: Blow Out
programme.desc: A sound man (John Travolta) re-creates a political murder-by-car-crash with a sight-and-sound montage.

programme.title: Mississippi Burning
programme.desc: Two FBI agents face racism while investigating the disappearance of three civil rights activists in 1964 Mississippi.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defense attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher (Tom Cruise) goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas
programme.desc: Intent on drinking himself to death, a man (Nicolas Cage) who has lost everything finds solace with a Las Vegas hooker (Elisabeth Shue).

programme.title: Runaway Train
programme.desc: Escaped convicts (Jon Voight, Eric Roberts) and a stowaway girl (Rebecca De Mornay) ride an unmanned diesel speeding out of control through Alaska.

programme.title: Into the Blue 2: The Reef
programme.desc: Two professional divers (Chris Carmack, Laura Vandervoort) fight for their lives when they encounter criminals in Hawaiian waters.

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: A teenage boy receives a tape of The Clash's White Riot in the mail from his estranged mother and sets out to find her.

programme.title: Soapdish
programme.desc: The star (Sally Field) of a soap opera is rattled by her ex-lover's (Kevin Kline) return to the daytime drama The Sun Also Sets.

programme.title: Monstrous
programme.desc: A terrifying new horror awaits Laura and her 7-year-old son, Cody, when they flee her abusive ex-husband and try to settle into a new life. Still traumatized, their fragile existence is pushed to the breaking point.

programme.title: A Mighty Heart
programme.desc: Mariane Pearl (Angelina Jolie) begins a terrifying search for her husband, journalist Daniel Pearl (Dan Futterman), after he is kidnapped by terrorists in 2002 Pakistan.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Pushed beyond their limits, three overworked and stressed-out mothers (Mila Kunis, Kristen Bell, Kathryn Hahn) go wild after ditching their daily routines.

programme.title: Love, Rosie
programme.desc: Rosie and Alex are best friends until Alex's family moves to America. They gamble everything to keep their love and friendship alive over the years and miles.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her divorce, spends her commute fantasizing about the couple that lives in a house that her train passes. One morning, she sees something shocking and becomes entangled in a missing person's investigation.

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a wounded Confederate soldier (Jude Law) abandons his duties to make his way home to his sweetheart (Nicole Kidman).

programme.title: Past Lives
programme.desc: Nora and Hae Sung, two deeply connected childhood friends, are wrest apart after Nora's family emigrates from South Korea. Decades later, they are reunited for one fateful week as they confront destiny, love and the choices that make a life.

programme.title: Minari
programme.desc: A Korean American family moves to an Arkansas farm in search of its own American dream. Amidst the challenges of this new life in the strange and rugged Ozarks, they discover the undeniable resilience of family and what really makes a home.

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: In 1950s Connecticut, two suburbanites (Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet) become increasingly dissatisfied with their marriage and society's expectations of conformity.

programme.title: Frida
programme.desc: Mexican painter Frida Kahlo (Salma Hayek) marries fellow artist Diego Rivera who shares her radical political views.

programme.title: A Mighty Heart
programme.desc: Mariane Pearl (Angelina Jolie) begins a terrifying search for her husband, journalist Daniel Pearl (Dan Futterman), after he is kidnapped by terrorists in 2002 Pakistan.

programme.title: Mansfield Park
programme.desc: Sent to live with relatives by her impoverished parents, a girl grows up, becomes a writer and falls in love.

programme.title: Cinma
programme.desc: Jeanne uses her charms and intelligence to climb the social ladder. Against all convention, she becomes one of the favorites of King Louis XV and moves to Versailles.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Writer J.M. Barrie (Johnny Depp) befriends a widow (Kate Winslet) and her four sons who inspire him to create the character Peter Pan.

programme.title: You Hurt My Feelings
programme.desc: A novelist's long-standing marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband give his honest reaction to her latest book.

programme.title: I.Q.
programme.desc: Albert Einstein (Walter Matthau) plays matchmaker for his egghead niece (Meg Ryan) and an unschooled auto mechanic (Tim Robbins).

programme.title: Sheryl
programme.desc: Singer-songwriter Sheryl Crow rises to superstardom and finds a way to turn even her darkest experiences into captivating, timeless work -- creating a legacy that continues to inspire and influence generations.

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: Maya and her young daughter are forced to live underground when Earth is left uninhabitable due to a lack of oxygen. They soon find themselves in a fight for survival when a mysterious couple arrive and claim to know the fate of Maya's husband.

programme.title: The Lodge
programme.desc: During a family retreat to a remote winter cabin, a man leaves his two children in the care of his new girlfriend, Grace. Isolated and alone, a blizzard traps them inside the lodge as terrifying events summon specters from Grace's dark past.

programme.title: Rumours
programme.desc: Leaders of the world's wealthiest democracies become spectacles of incompetence, contending with increasingly surreal obstacles as night falls in the misty woods and they realize they are suddenly alone.

programme.title: The Uninvited
programme.desc: A ghost prompts a lethal battle of wills between a man's new fiancee (Elizabeth Banks) and his two daughters (Emily Browning, Arielle Kebbel), one of whom has just returned from a mental ward.

programme.title: I.S.S.
programme.desc: Tensions flare in the near future aboard the International Space Station when a worldwide conflict breaks out on Earth. Soon, the U.S. and Russian astronauts each receive orders from the ground: take control of the station by any means necessary.

programme.title: Wild Eyed and Wicked
programme.desc: A woman tries to strike back at the medieval creature that's haunted her family for generations. To do so, she must learn how to draw upon a time of steel and blade when armor-clad knights rode out and dueled monsters to the death.

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: Maya and her young daughter are forced to live underground when Earth is left uninhabitable due to a lack of oxygen. They soon find themselves in a fight for survival when a mysterious couple arrive and claim to know the fate of Maya's husband.

programme.title: Sheryl
programme.desc: Singer-songwriter Sheryl Crow rises to superstardom and finds a way to turn even her darkest experiences into captivating, timeless work -- creating a legacy that continues to inspire and influence generations.

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: Following the journey of Vanessa, a grief-stricken woman who mysteriously finds herself navigating between parallel spaces.

programme.title: Together Together
programme.desc: A young loner becomes a surrogate mother for a single, middle-aged man who wants a child. Their unexpected relationship soon challenges their perceptions of connection, boundaries and the particulars of love.

programme.title: Becoming Jane
programme.desc: Though her parents expect her to marry a wealthy suitor, young Jane Austen (Anne Hathaway) becomes involved with a penniless lawyer (James McAvoy) who inspires her future writings.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: A young princess (Audrey Hepburn), tired of her constraints, runs off with a U.S. newsman (Gregory Peck) in Rome.

programme.title: Indecent Proposal
programme.desc: A Las Vegas mystery man (Robert Redford) offers a desperate couple (Demi Moore, Woody Harrelson) $1 million for a night with the wife.

programme.title: Nothing Compares
programme.desc: Following the career of singer Sinad O'Connor through her rise to fame and how her iconoclastic personality led to her exile from the pop mainstream.

programme.title: Twisted
programme.desc: With help from her partner (Andy Garcia), a police inspector (Ashley Judd) searches for a killer who is murdering her former lovers.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: A man (Matthew Broderick) and his wife (Nicole Kidman) move to a quaint suburb where most of the women seem to have the same bland personality.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool
programme.desc: Wild child Tanya looks to her buttoned-up, by-the-book sister Danica to help her get back on her feet. As these polar opposites collide, Tanya soon discovers that Danica's picture-perfect life and boyfriend may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Jersey Girl
programme.desc: A young woman (Liv Tyler) changes the life of a single father (Ben Affleck) who used to be a successful New York music publicist.

programme.title: Failure to Launch
programme.desc: The parents of a young man (Matthew McConaughey) who still lives at home hire a beautiful woman (Sarah Jessica Parker) to entice him to finally leave the nest.

programme.title: Regarding Henry
programme.desc: Two bullets force a career-driven Manhattan lawyer (Harrison Ford) to start life over with his loving wife (Annette Bening) and daughter.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: A man (Matthew Broderick) and his wife (Nicole Kidman) move to a quaint suburb where most of the women seem to have the same bland personality.

programme.title: Together Together

programme.title: Almost Famous
programme.desc: An aspiring teenage rock journalist gets his big break when he follows an up-and-coming band on its tour.

programme.title: The Mexican
programme.desc: A bungling gangster (Brad Pitt) must reform to please his girlfriend (Julia Roberts) but still has one last job to fulfill.

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby
programme.desc: A pregnant woman's (Mia Farrow) husband (John Cassavetes) and their satanic neighbors want her baby to be the Antichrist.

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a wounded Confederate soldier (Jude Law) abandons his duties to make his way home to his sweetheart (Nicole Kidman).

programme.title: The Talented Mr. Ripley

programme.title: The Girl on the Train

programme.title: Strange Darling
programme.desc: Nothing is what it seems when a twisted one-night stand spirals into a serial killer's vicious murder spree.

programme.title: Bound
programme.desc: A mobster's (Joe Pantoliano) disgruntled girlfriend (Jennifer Tilly) steals $2 million from him with the help of her lesbian lover (Gina Gershon).

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: A New York lawyer (Michael Douglas) with a wife (Anne Archer) and daughter sleeps with a client (Glenn Close) whose lust turns to hate.

programme.title: In Her Skin
programme.desc: The parents (Guy Pearce, Miranda Otto) of a missing girl launch a frantic search for their daughter, unaware that the child's former baby sitter (Ruth Bradley) has murdered her.

programme.title: The Wrath of Becky

programme.title: Stalag 17
programme.desc: Laced with comedy and cynicism, this is the story of a group of GIs who are thrown together in the notorious German prison camp Stalag 17, their suspicions about one being a spy and their efforts to escape.

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: This masterful story of a war-weary World War II veteran who must leave his family to fight again combines moving drama with surefire, bombs-away aerial action. Also starring Grace Kelly as his loving, luminescent wife.

programme.title: War and Peace
programme.desc: The personal stories of many characters, love affairs and philosophies are woven throughout this massive and intricate tapestry of Russia during Napoleon's invasion at the turn of the 19th century.

programme.title: The African Queen
programme.desc: A timeless tale of two mismatched strangers joining forces in a common cause - and finding love along the way. The story chronicles the burgeoning romance as they reluctantly join forces to torpedo a German gunboat in war-torn East Africa.

programme.title: The Seven Year Itch
programme.desc: With his family away for their annual summer holiday, New Yorker Richard Sherman (Tom Ewell) decides he has the opportunity to live a bachelor's life. The beautiful but ditsy blond (Marilyn Monroe) from the apartment above his catches his eye.

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: A weird inventor, Caractacus Potts, invents an amazing flying car, which drives by itself. It takes him and his Family to Vulgaria, where the sinister buffoon Baron Bomburst kidnaps the car.

programme.title: Hatari
programme.desc: Director Howard Hawks reteams with John Wayne, who heads a group of highly skilled professional game hunters in Africa. Only they dont use bullets they capture the ferocious big game with strong rope and cameras for zoos and circus attractions.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: The Raid 2 (Subtitled)
programme.desc: Following immediately after the events of THE RAID, Rama (Iko Uwais) is forced to reinvent himself as an undercover cop in order to provide protection for his wife and child.

programme.title: Striking Distance
programme.desc: Coming from a police family, Tom Hardy ends up fighting his uncle after the murder of his father. Tom believes the killer is another cop and goes on the record with his allegations. Demoted then to river duty, the killer taunts Tom.

programme.title: Defiance
programme.desc: Defiance is a riveting adventure that showcases the extraordinary true story of the Bielski brothers, simple farmers -outnumbered and outgunned- who turned a group of war refugees into powerful freedom fighters.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man
programme.desc: Three friends stumble upon the horrific origins of a mysterious figure they discover is the root cause of the evil behind unspeakable acts.

programme.title: The Amityville Horror

programme.desc: A post-concert party at a remote country mansion turns into a grisly satanic slaughter scene in this dark-humored horror-thriller starring Alexandra Daddario and Johnny Knoxville.

programme.title: Succubus
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.desc: Tintin and his friends discover directions to a sunken ship commanded by Capt. Haddock's ancestor and go off on a treasure hunt.

When a student writes the police code for homicide, 187, inside a textbook owned by teacher Trevor Garfield, he feels threatened.

programme.desc: Following immediately after the events of THE RAID, Rama (Iko Uwais) is forced to reinvent himself as an undercover cop in order to provide protection for his wife and child.

programme.title: The Grandmaster
programme.desc: From director Wong Kar Wai and starring Tony Leung and Ziyi Yang, THE GRANDMASTER is an epic action film inspired by the life of Ip Man, the legendary kung fu master who trained Bruce Lee.

programme.title: My Blueberry Nights
programme.desc: A young woman takes a soul-searching journey across America to resolve her questions about love while encountering a series of offbeat characters along the way.

programme.title: A Very Brady Sequel
programme.desc: Mike (Gary Cole) is a planning a surprise wedding anniversary party for Carol (Shelly Long) - until Carol's long-lost first husband, Roy (Tim Matheson), shows up to shake the family tree.

programme.title: Bio-Dome
programme.desc: In this outrageous Comedy, five brave scientists are forced to face life forms more perplexing, more terrifying, more annoying than anything they've ever encountered: Pauly Shore and Stephen Baldwin.

programme.title: Dead Man on Campus
programme.desc: Josh is the studious type, Cooper's has a slacker lifestyle that rubs off on Josh and soon has both in danger of flunking out. But there's a catch: a clause in the schools charter awards A's to students who suffer the trauma of a roommate's suicide.

programme.title: Four Rooms
programme.desc: It is New Year's Eve at Hotel Mon Signor. Ted, the bellhop, is working his first night on the job, and the hotel's very unusual guests are about to place him in some outrageously funny predicaments. It's a wild night with a sizzling all-star cast.

programme.title: Idle Hands
programme.desc: The devil will find work for idle hands to do, but what happens when he chooses the laziest teen slacker in the world to do his dirty work? Anton Tobias is a couch potato burn-out who can't control the murderous impulses of his possessed hand. Rated: R

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves is a space-age courier who's plugged in, turned on and buffed up to deliver the most important data of the 21st century, wet-wired directly into his brain! A rapid-fire roller coaster of action and high-impact imagery! Rating: R

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
programme.desc: Gary Oldman, Winona Ryder and Anthony Hopkins star in director Francis Ford Coppola's visually stunning, passionately seductive version of the classic Dracula legend. Rated: R

programme.title: Jawbreaker
programme.desc: "The beautiful ones. The flawless four. Everyone wanted to be them. You know 'em". First there's Courtney "Satan-in-heels" Shayne and her pawn, the dense but dangerous Marcie Fox, a legend in her own little mind. Rated: R

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

programme.title: Mr. Majestyk
programme.desc: Charles Bronson stars as an ex-con and Vietnam vet whose efforts to run a straight business soon have him locking horns with both the law and the mafia in this explosive tale of backwoods revenge.

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: In a role that powered him to stardom, Charles Bronson is an underworld executioner who turns murder into an art form in this ultimate crime chiller.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: Death Wish
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: White Lightning
programme.desc: In one of his most memorable roles, Burt Reynolds portrays a moonshine whiskey runner who turns state's witness to avenge the murder of a boy no one understood.

programme.title: And Justice for All
programme.desc: When a corrupt judge is charged with rape, Arthur Kirkland must defend him. Kirkland has had problems with the judge in the past, including one incident when the judge wrongly sentenced his client, Jeff McCullaugh, because of a technicality. Rated R

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gateway opens for the final endgame as the world-devourer Grand Dragon Leviathan and the legendary Atlantis rise out of its watery grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: All the monsters of Earth join forces with the survivors of the monster domain for an epic showdown against Grand Dragon Leviathan!
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grand Dragon Leviathan's thunderous roars unleash hundred-foot tall waves worldwide! How can Yugi stop the annihilation of the planet?
programme.sub-title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they're about to face their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer, programmed with the skills of the world's top duelists. Since the Duel Computer has access to thousands of cards, how can Yugi win?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the start of the KC Grand Championship! Sixteen of the world's greatest duelists vie for a chance to challenge Yugi as the King of Games!
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey's strategies? How can Joey stop Apdnarg when he gathers his ancient cards to unleash the fiercest monster from the great past? But the biggest mystery... how can Joey not know who Apdnarg Otum is?
programme.sub-title: Let the Games Begin! Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong. However, there's more at stake than just winning the duel - Yugi's heart is on the line, whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship. Unfortunately for Joey, his next opponent is Zigfried Lloyd, who defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor in one turn.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it's a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa's kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? While Yugi unravels the truth, Rebecca starts to unravel when her dragons fall prey to Leon's fervent fables. Rebecca must think of a new plan quickly or there will be no happy ending.
programme.sub-title: A Brawl in Small Town Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a battle between Zigfried and Kaiba. Zigfried quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba's monsters before he can even draw them!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! Something sinister lurks in the shadows, for this duel is more than just getting the crown. Zigfried's greatest revenge will commence as his real plan is unleashed.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried's younger brother, and he'll avenge his family's loss. Leon's fairy tales are giving Yugi nightmares but the worst is yet to come as Leon has Zigfried's mysterious and special card.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world's Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp. If Yugi doesn't destroy the card, the virus program can't be stopped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang goes on an exotic trip to India, but when their plane crashes in a deserted forest, their vacation turns into a dangerous game of survival.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Fiveor so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.desc: Chimney and Gombe show Luffy the secret passage that leads to Robin, and Franky puts on a display of raw punching power thanks to a few bottles of cola!
programme.sub-title: Fukurou's miscalculation! My cola is the water of life!

programme.desc: While Frankys brawl spills into the ocean, Usopp and Sanji attempt to overcome their handcuffs by outsmarting their opponents!
programme.sub-title: Zoro busts out a new technique! The sword's name is sniper king?

programme.desc: Determined not to be defeated by the heinous hair of a devious lion, Chopper risks life and limb by summoning the power of his Rumble Ball for a third time!

programme.desc: Travel back to ancient Japan for a madcap adventure starring the Straw Hats, some old friends and enemies, and a camel that eats lottery tickets!

programme.desc: Franky and Nami come up with a plan to stop Choppers rampage, but it could prove deadly to the not-so-little reindeer. Usopp and Zoro are thrilled to finally be free of each other!

programme.desc: Luffys battle with Lucci reveals the powerful secrets of the rubber mans second gear, and the Spandams thoughtless Buster Call begins with a brutal barrage of cannonballs.

programme.desc: When an ancient tree is stolen by a madman with the power to freeze time, Luffy, Usopp, and Sanji track down the culprit in an attempt to save a villages annual festival!
programme.sub-title: Boss luffy is the culprit? Track down the missing great cherry tree!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami, Sanji, Usopp, Zoro, and company find themselves trapped in a tunnel filled with rapidly rising water. Meanwhile, Luffy musters the strength for one last stand in his battle with Lucci.
programme.sub-title: I can't protect anyone unless i win! Third gear activated!

programme.sub-title: Cannon fire sinks the island! Franky's lamentation!

programme.desc: Luffy pushes his body to the breaking point in his battle with Lucci, and the rest of the Straw Hats try to fight off a fleet of Marines until their captain returns if he ever does.
programme.sub-title: Wait for luffy! Mortal combat on the bridge of hesitation!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy lies battered and badly beaten, but Usopps desperate pleas inspire the rubber-man to mount one final, furious attack on Rob Lucci!

programme.sub-title: From the sea, a friend arrives! The straw hats share the strongest bond!

programme.title: One Piece

programme.sub-title: Everyone makes a great escape! The road to victory is for the pirates!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats bid a tearful farewell to the brave little ship that was their home for so very many adventures. Rest in peace, Merry!

programme.desc: The Straw Hats get some much needed rest and relaxation, Franky makes a big announcement, and Vice Admiral Garp tracks down his grandson!
programme.sub-title: Peace interrupted! A navy vice admiral with a fist of love!

programme.desc: Luffys friends are shocked to learn that his grandpa is a marine hero, but thats nothing compared to how surprised theyll be by his fathers true identity!
programme.sub-title: The strongest family? Luffy's father revealed!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy gets the chance to catch up with his old friend Coby, Nami does some serious snooping, and Robin is paid a chilling visit from a terrifying face from her past.
programme.sub-title: Its name is the new world! The fate of the grand line!

programme.sub-title: Shanks makes a move! The linchpin to the reckless era!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and Chopper risk their lives to help a heartbroken young girl track down her long lost pet!
programme.sub-title: A girl in search of her yagara! Great search in the city of water!

programme.desc: Zoros day takes a turn for the crazy when his search for a new sword is derailed by a couple of meddling orphans!
programme.sub-title: Mothers are strong! Zoro's hectic household chores!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal an exquisite painting of a young girl from a Renoir art exhibit. Using the painting as bait, Lupin and his gang plan to steal Ghellon's impressive art collection.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: John Decker, an oil tycoon from Colorado hires Lupin to steal the US presidential limousine and promises to pay 10 million dollars in return.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were scoping out their next target, Macintosh Jewelry, the world's most expensive jewelry store when they end up inadvertently saving a young boy who was being kidnapped.
programme.sub-title: Boy Genius Plays a Dangerous Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang make off with the New York Mafia's secret cash hoard. However, the suitcases were filled with old newspapers and as retribution, the mafia puts a hefty bounty on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang blow up Fontaubert Bank's underground safe to steal 5 tons worth of gold, but someone has beaten them to it. The thieves are a pair of disguise artists named John and Mary.
programme.sub-title: The Target Beyond the Snowy Field

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Eagle of Helazard from a luxury cruise ship, but Fujiko betrays them at the last moment and makes off with the Eagle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata is even more determined to capture Lupin after an incident with Anne. Lupin and his gang will soon learn that Inspector Zenigata is a force to be reckoned with when he's raging mad.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon has been thrown into prison for a crime he did not commit. He is charged with cutting off the Little Mermaid's arm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious army steals 3 tons worth of gold under Inspector Zenigata's watch. His superiors are convinced Lupin stole the gold and holds Inspector Zenigata responsible.
programme.sub-title: Give the Gold to My Rival

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has lottery fever, or to be specific, has his eyes set on the 50 million dollar jackpot. However, Lupin discovers the lottery is rigged.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'tat is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Count Bone and Lord Wave operate the Rondo Insurance Company. The two seem like perfect English gentlemen, but they make their money through dirty tactics.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: At Fujiko's request, Lupin steals the Hina dolls given to the US Vice President by the Deputy Prime Minister of Japan. However, the doll heist was a trap laid out by Fujiko and her partner, Barracuda.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The 100-carat blue diamond, known as Hades' Tear is auctioned off at 1 billion dollars along with its accompanying Hades statue to the KL Foundation of Kingsland. Lupin and Jigen make off with Hades' Tear with ease, but they find out it's only glass.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mexico's richest woman, Madame Tequila owns a black diamond named the Black Pig of Mexico. Realizing that Lupin is after her diamond, Madame Tequila appoints Inspector Zenigata to guard it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Ivanov, the Soviet Union's newest atomic submarine from the Port of Arkhangelsk. Lupin becomes entangled in a fierce tug of war between the KGB and CIA when Fujiko decides to sell it to the highest bidder.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #9 Islands of Assasins
programme.desc: The den of the deadly Tarantulas gang, this island is the most dangerous place on Earth and Lupin's right in the middle of it! A dark mystery haunts his past, and the key to it is on the island.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #10 Tokyo Crisis
programme.desc: When Lupin and his bandit buddies attempt to steal a set of historically significant photographic plates, it turns out they're not the only ones with eyes on the prize in this thievish tale of mayhem and millionaires.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Europa Report
programme.desc: Six top astronauts set out to explore the possibility of a hidden ocean and life beneath Europas icy surface. After a near-catastrophic technical failure, the survivors must overcome the tolls of deep space travel.

programme.title: Ghost In The Shell
programme.desc: 2029 A female government cyber agent and the Internal Bureau of Investigations are hot on the trail of a "The Puppet Master" a computer virus capable of invading cybernetic brains and altering its victims memory.

programme.title: Timecop
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell) is nearing the completion of his 3-year-long contract with Lunar Industries, mining Earth's primary source of energy on the dark side of the moon.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: When a tech blogger lands an interview with a tech guru and stops an attack on him, he finds a mysterious ring that takes him back 57 seconds into the past.

programme.title: Double Team
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Born in the flames of hell and brought to Earth, Hellboy was rescued from sinister forces by the benevolent Dr. Broom, who raised him to be a hero. Hellboy stands as the key line of defense against an evil madman who seeks to destroy mankind.

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks
programme.desc: Marlon Brando and Jack Nicholson ignite the screen in this rousing story of a wealthy Montana rancher who hires a professional killer to track down a gang of horse thieves.

programme.title: One Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: Marlon Brandos only time as a Directo, Rio (Marlon Brando) also called "The Kid", his mentor Dad Longworth (Karl Malden), & a third man called Doc, rob a bank of two saddlebags of gold in Sonora, Mexico.

programme.title: Doc

programme.desc: Um ex-agente da Fora Delta foi capturado e vendido para um produtor de televiso que dirige um game show de dark reality onde nove criminosos so colocados em uma ilha. As regras so simples: apenas a ltima pessoa viva em 30 horas deixa a ilha.

programme.desc: Rap, carres, bluses de couro espalhafatosos e muita grana no bolso. Ace entra para o mundo do crime sem desconfiar que a partir da sua vida j no vale mais nada.

programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.desc: Um funcionrio que vtima de bullying deve libertar sua besta interior depois que um retiro de equipe na selva d errado.

programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notrio criminoso chins.

programme.desc: Um grupo de velhos amigos se rene para uma reunio a bordo de um iate de luxo, mas o evento se transforma em um pesadelo quando eles pulam no oceano para nadar sem derrubar a escada.

programme.desc: Alguns estudantes americanos comeam a morrer na Espanha devido a um jogo de tabuleiro.

programme.desc: Um grupo de youtubers entra ilegalmente na rea de cirurgia (supostamente assombrada) em um manicmio abandonado para um desafio de 24 horas, com a esperana de viralizar o vdeo e conseguirem mais seguidores.

programme.desc: Depois que o navio naufraga, um grupo de amigos chega a uma ilha sombria. O que a princpio parecia umas frias idlicas acabar se tornando uma luta angustiante pela sobrevivncia contra os canibais.

programme.title: A Maldio da Bruxa
programme.desc: Depois de regressar sua cidade natal, uma adolescente hostilizada pelos aldees que acreditavam que sua me desaparecida era uma bruxa. Agora, eles suspeitam que a filha possa ter os mesmos poderes sombrios.

programme.desc: Uma viagem a uma ilha torna-se mortal quando o dono de uma casa noturna misteriosa apresenta a um grupo de amigos uma droga que no pode ser tomada mais de uma vez.

programme.title: Rostos na Multido
programme.desc: Um serial killer teme a cidade. Um espectador inocente testemunha seu ltimo ataque, mas quando ela foge, ela cai de uma ponte e fica inconsciente.

programme.desc: Vera, uma famosa atriz de Nova York, deixa seu ex-namorado problemtico entrar em seu apartamento. Tudo se complica quando ele decide atac-la.

programme.desc: Quando uma jornalista informada por um agente do FBI que seu marido acaba de ser assassinado, os dois unem foras para desvendar uma rede de enganos chocante e mortal.

programme.title: Emboscada
programme.desc: Liberty, a esposa de um fabricante de armas, tomada como refm por um homem chamado Joe. Joe explica que sua filha morreu em um tiroteio no colgio e planeja se vingar dos responsveis pela fabricao da arma usada para mat-la.

programme.title: Contgio mortal
programme.desc: O caos instala-se quando um vrus mortal transmitido pelo ar infecta a populao de uma cidade sul-coreana a menos de 20 quilmetros de Seul.

programme.title: Os Escolhidos
programme.desc: Lacey e Daniel descobrem que sua famlia o alvo de uma fora mortal inimaginvel e aterrorizante. Ambos tero que fazer tudo ao seu alcance para resolver este mistrio escuro e salvar suas vidas.

programme.title: Tubaro De Malibu
programme.desc: Em Malibu, um tsunami provoca o reaparecimento de uma espcie pr-histrica de tubaro, que se acreditava estar extinta e que se dedica a atacar os banhistas.

programme.title: Mad Genius
programme.desc: Mason um brilhante cientista que acredita que os seres humanos so programados para destruir tudo o que encontram pela frente. Para corrigir os erros da humanidade, ele decide hackear a mente humana, sem pensar nas consequncias de seus atos.

programme.title: O Degelo
programme.desc: Um parasita pr-histrico e mortal liberado quando um mamute congelado descoberto. Frente a uma potente epidemia global, quatro estudantes de ecologia devem destruir o parasita antes que ele alcance o restante da populao.

programme.title: Zumbis E Robs

programme.title: Perigo em Bangkok
programme.desc: Joe um assassino que est na Tailndia para realizar quatro assassinatos sob encomenda. Os alvos so inimigos de Surat, um chefo do crime local. Para no ter que realizar o trabalho sozinho ele contrata Kong, um batedor de carteiras.

programme.title: South Park - S2E3

programme.title: South Park - S3E2

programme.title: South Park - S3E4

programme.title: South Park - S6E12

programme.title: South Park - S17E6

programme.title: South Park - S1E5

programme.desc: Kyle est se sentindo s por ser judio. Fora isso, ningum acredita nele quando ele tenta convercer os cidados de South Park sobre a existncia de Mr.Hankey, o coc do Natal.

programme.title: South Park - S1E12
programme.desc: Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavao escolar e saem no jornal. Barbra Streisand aparece na cidade buscando o tal objeto, pois a ltima pea necessria para que ela possa se transformar em um monstro japons gigante.

programme.desc: Um novo aluno mrmon se muda South Park, mas no se d bem com ningum. Os rapazes querem que Stan comece uma briga com ele, mas na verdade, ele acaba se tornando seu amigo.

programme.title: South Park - S8E10

programme.title: Super Onze: Ares no Tenbin - S1E11

programme.desc: Com sua armadura cientificamente avanada, Valon sistematicamente acaba com cada jogada de Joey!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S4E34

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S4E37
programme.desc: A alma de Kaiba foi capturada, deixando o Fara sozinho para se defender das foras invencveis de Dartz e de Orichalcos!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S4E38
programme.desc: Dartz invoca a Serpente Divina Geh, que tem pontos infinitos de ataque! Yugi contra-ataca fundindo os trs cavaleiros drages lendrios no poderoso Timaeus, o Cavaleiro do Destino, mas isso ser suficiente para combater um monstro com fora ilimitada?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Classic BR - S4E39

programme.desc: Os rugidos trovejantes do Grande Drago Leviat desencadeiam ondas de 30 metros de altura em todo o mundo, para destruir todas as cidades da Terra e destruir todos os traos da humanidade!

programme.desc: Yugi e a turma salvaram o mundo de Dartz e seu Grande Drago Leviat, mas esto prestes a enfrentar seu maior desafio de todos como vo voltar para casa se no tm dinheiro?!

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E8
programme.desc: chegada a cerimnia de abertura do Torneio Juvenil Internacional, e Misaki relembra seu tempo no Japo e tudo o que se passou. Mas nem todas as memrias so felizes. A carreira de seu pai como artista no tem sido fcil para nenhum dos dois.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E9
programme.desc: O Japo joga contra a Itlia na abertura do torneio, e as emoes esto mil. A seleo japonesa ainda guarda mgoa de quando foram menosprezados pelos italianos, em um amistoso que no aconteceu. Mesmo assim, Tsubasa encara o desafio.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E10
programme.desc: O goleiro da Itlia, Zino Hernandez, faz defesas incrveis. Tanto que por estar invicto ele conhecido como o melhor goleiro da Europa. Isso coloca o Japo na ofensiva, mas Misaki est observando. Ento o treinador surpreende a todos.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E11
programme.desc: Graas a Tsubasa e Misaki, o Japo alcana a Itlia obrigando-os a fechar a defesa na esperana de um empate. Enquanto isso, no ltimo minuto de jogo, a torcida incentiva o Japo e Tsubasa faz uma ltima aposta...

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E12
programme.desc: Frana, a anfitri do torneio, joga sua primeira partida contra a Inglaterra. Elle Sid Pierre, o capito francs, surpreende com suas elegantes habilidades. Enquanto isso, mesmo impressionando Tsubasa e seus amigos, a Seleo Francesa sente a presso.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E13
programme.desc: O ex-jogador Brasileiro Roberto Hongo conversa com Katagiri fora de Paris e deixa claro que no quer que Tsubasa saiba que ele est l. Como ex-treinador de Tsubasa, Roberto se arrepende de quebrar a promessa que fez a ele.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E14
programme.desc: Japo contra Argentina, e o vencedor vai para a final. No entanto, Tsubasa est preocupado. Ele descobre que seu ex-treinador Roberto - que estava se escondendo - agora est assistindo de algum lugar.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E15
programme.desc: Enquanto o Japo se recupera da ltima faanha de Diaz, Tsubasa e Hyuga se unem para um ataque especial. Tsubasa recupera a confiana. Aproveitando a oportunidade, os irmos Tachibana e Jito avanam em direo ao gol. A hora do contra-ataque agora!

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E16
programme.desc: Misaki acerta um chute milagroso e empata para o Japo. Mas um empate no basta para lev-los s semifinais. Com ambos os times to decididos, no h como saber quem ser o vencedor.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E17
programme.desc: O placar 4x4 no segundo tempo. Para quebrar o impasse, o Japo pe em campo Jun Misugi, um jogador incrvel que sofre de uma doena cardaca. Aps trs anos Jun finalmente divide o campo novamente com Tsubasa. A Argentina tem um desafio pela frente!

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E18
programme.desc: Graas jogada de Misugi, o Japo est vencendo pela primeira vez. Mas o auto-intitulado gnio manda seu Chute com Curva sobre a cabea de todos, fazendo um grande arco no cu. Quem avana para as semifinais?

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E19
programme.desc: O primeiro jogo das semifinais. O Uruguai comea com ataques rpidos como raios, conseguindo um gol nos primeiros cinquenta segundos. Mas o alemo Schneider empata a partida. No h como saber qual artilheiro vencer...

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E20
programme.desc: No segundo jogo das semifinais o Japo enfrenta os anfitries da Frana em um estdio cheio de fs locais fervorosos. Mesmo assim, atravs de um ataque combinado que rouba a bola do furioso capito francs, Pierre, que parece estar tramando algo...

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E21
programme.desc: Aos dez minutos do primeiro tempo, Soda recebe o segundo carto amarelo, forando o Japo a jogar com apenas dez. Pierre consegue um penalty, deixando o placar 2 a 1. Hyuga no desiste, mas o Japo parece estar sem sorte...

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E22
programme.desc: No segundo tempo a chuva castiga os jogadores em campo. A Frana lana um ataque furioso, mas o Japo acaba salvo. Porm Izawa est contundido. Em seu lugar, Misugi entra confiante de que o jogo vai virar. Que o duelo de capites comece!

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E23
programme.desc: Eis o enigmtico Ataque Eiffel da Frana! O Japo est pronto com reflexos afiados, mas s d Pierre e Napolen. Passes perfeitos permitem a Frana o acesso ao gol. Conseguir Tsubasa reanimar seu time?

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E24
programme.desc: Graas a Misaki o jogo empatou, dando incio a primeira prorrogao do torneio. Mas o Treinador Mikami no tem mais substituies, e todos esto muito cansados. Os piores medos do Japo se concretizaram. As coisas no parecem boas...

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E25
programme.desc: Chegou a prorrogao e Hyuga est pronto para a briga. Ele enfrenta Pierre, mas sua perna lesionada d ao oponente a chance de roubar a bola. A Frana continua com uma onda brutal de ataques. Enquanto isso, Wakashimazu se contorce de dor.

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E26
programme.desc: Deciso por pnaltis pura presso. Soa o apito. Quem ser o vencedor hoje?

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E27
programme.desc: Enfim, a final! O Japo enfrenta a Alemanha, mas apesar de terem chegado at aqui, muitos jogadores esto contundidos. E o time titular uma grande surpresa, com a estria de Wakabayashi. O Japo est mais forte do que nunca!

programme.title: Captain Tsubasa: Junior Youth Arc - S1E28
programme.desc: Chegou a hora do pontap inicial da final! A investigao de Wakabayashi sobre a Seleo Alem foi bem sucedida, dando ao Japo a vantagem no incio. S que dessa vez o goleiro da Alemanha o evasivo e intenso Gigante de Ao, Deuter Mller.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E12
programme.desc: Valt e Rantaro alcanam seu velho amigo, Daigo, o novo capito do AS Gallus. Eles podero ver os novos movimentos do Doomscizor, antes do confronto de suas equipes.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E13
programme.desc: O grande jogo entre BC Sol e AS Gallus finalmente chegou! Diago percorreu um longo caminho desde seus dias na Bey Club Beigoma Academy. A evoluo de Valtryek ser suficiente para ajudar Valt a derrotar seu velho amigo?

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E14

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E15

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E16

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E17
programme.desc: Valt, Rantaro, Wakiya, Daigo e Cuza descobrem o Snake Pit, um centro de treinamento clandestino ultrassecreto. Quando se deparam com um Spryzen novo e evoludo, percebem que esto perto do rastro de Shu.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E18
programme.desc: A busca por Shu continua! Valt e seus amigos encontram alguns Bladers temveis no Snake Pit, incluindo um vidente, um acrobata e um f rtico.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E19
programme.desc: Valt pode estar perto de dominar seu Bey, mas ainda no consegue passar pelo Snake Pit. Aps aprender uma nova tcnica, ele e seus amigos arriscam tudo em um desafio contra Red Eye.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E20
programme.desc: Depois de uma emocionante aventura na selva mexicana, Valt retorna para casa em BC Sol. A tenso aumenta quando um amigo talentoso aparece para se juntar equipe.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E21
programme.desc: H emoo no ar quando o astro de cinema Joshua Burns aparece na cidade para filmar seu novo filme de ao. Valt, Audaz e Cuza so escolhidos como os Space Ninjas, os arquiinimigos Blader do heri.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E22
programme.desc: Luzes, cmera, ao! Valt, Rantaro e Cuza aprenderam suas falas, praticaram seus papis e se destacaram mas ser que conseguiro derrotar Joshua Burns?

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E23
programme.desc: BC Sol est procura de um novo treinador. Ao encontrar um velho veterano, a equipe o convida para completar um perodo de experincia. Embora a equipe esteja entusiasmada, Kris tem algumas reservas sobre a potencial nova contratao.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E24
programme.desc: Com a Liga Mundial chegando, os Clubes esto finalizando os preparativos para o grande evento. Depois de ingressar nos Raging Bulls, Joshua aproveita a oportunidade de se aproximar de seu heri, Free.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E25
programme.desc: Valt recebe uma carta inesperada de Xander. Acontece que seu velho amigo se mudou para o Brasil para ingressar no renomado SB Rios. Mas para provar que merece um lugar na equipe, o gigante sorridente deve passar no teste dos 100 Bladers!

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E26
programme.desc: BC Sol enfrenta o Royals, em revanche digna de um rei. Desta vez, Valt deve ter certeza de que est preparado. Com a ajuda de Rickson e Raul, ele no descansar at aperfeioar seu novo movimento.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E27
programme.desc: Como bom estar em casa! O retorno de Valt traz algumas recompensas: rever os amigos, reunir-se com a famlia e comer po Bey caseiro.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E28
programme.desc: Emergindo das sombras, um misterioso novo blader faz sua apario no palco da Liga Mundial. Conseguir Cuza descobrir as verdadeiras intenes deste espectro com presas?

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E29
programme.desc: Val e suas amigas viajam ao Brasil para o charmoso e animado Carnaval de Bey. Nem tudo corre conforme o planejado, pois os meninos acabam em apuros. Dessa vez, ser necessrio muito mais do que uma atitude positiva para tirar o BC Sol do buraco.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E30
programme.desc: No h reservas neste confronto de fortes impactos, voos rpidos e metal retorcido, entre BC Sol e SB Rios. A Liga Mundial agora tem os candidatos s semifinais e cada equipe est mais forte do que nunca.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E31
programme.desc: Nada pode extinguir as chamas destas batalhas ardentes! Com tanta coisa em risco, Valt e seus amigos devem usar todos os seus talentos para tentarem se redimir. Enquanto isso, Raging Bulls e AS Gallus lutam em um confronto pico e equilibrado.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E32
programme.desc: As demais equipes do torneio da Liga Mundial esto cada vez mais perto de garantir uma vaga na partida final. Valt tem uma oportunidade de ouro para se testar contra seu velho amigo Xander.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E33
programme.desc: A final da Liga Mundial est aqui! O evento glamoroso d as boas-vindas a todas as estrelas, antigos rivais e ex-companheiros de equipe, e Valt no gostaria que fosse de outra forma.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E34
programme.desc: O confronto pico entre os competidores finais continua, e nem mesmo um mdium poderia adivinhar o que vem a seguir. Esses Bladers so os melhores em sua classe, e ambas as equipes esto lado a lado.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E35
programme.desc: A Final da Liga Mundial continua e se h uma coisa certa que nunca houve um confronto como este. Todo o trabalho do BC Sol leva at este momento decisivo. Quem ter a tenacidade de estar altura da situao e conquistar a coroa?

programme.title: Beyblade Burst - S2E36
programme.desc: Depois de aceitar o que parecia ser um desafio impossvel, Red Eye retorna para reivindicar seu lugar como o Blader mais poderoso. Ele no permitir que ningum atrapalhe sua busca por poder e destruio.

programme.title: One Piece - S4E78

programme.title: One Piece - S4E80
programme.desc: Enquanto Usopp e Zoro enfrentam uma dupla de animais assassinos, Sanji ensina a arte do ch mais bela integrante do CP9!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E81
programme.desc: Luffy se mete em enrascada tentando alcanar Robin, e Usopp e Zoro acabam algemados um no outro. Sanji, incapaz de enfrentar Kalifa, acaba seriamente ferido!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E82
programme.desc: Chimney e Gombe mostram a Luffy uma passagem secreta que o levar at Robin e Franky mostra o poder de seus socos aps alguns goles de refrigerante!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E83
programme.desc: Enquanto Franky desfere seus socos, Usopp e Zoro tentam se livrar de suas algemas na base da malcia!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E84
programme.desc: Determinado a no ser derrotado, Chopper arrisca a vida e faz uso do poder de sua Goma do Barulho pela terceira vez!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E85
programme.desc: Uma viagem Grande Jipang para uma louca aventura com a trupe da Cantina Catavento, velhos conhecidos e inimigos, e um camelo que gosta de bilhetes de loteria!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E86
programme.desc: A saga na Grande Jipang continua, e Luffy e os demais competem por um tesouro inestimvel escondido dentro de um bolinho de arroz!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E87
programme.desc: Nami enfrenta Kalifa e suas bolhas letais, e Chopper revela sua besta inferior, enquanto Luffy se aproxima de Robin!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E88
programme.desc: Franky tem um ferrenho encontro com o monstro Chopper, e Nami acaba ensaboada demais para lutar! Enquanto isso, Spandam acaba ativando o Chamado da Destruio acidentalmente!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E89
programme.desc: Zoro usa Usopp como isca na batalha, e Nami descobrem o segredo que pode ser a chance de sobrevivncia em sua batalha contra Kalifa!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E90
programme.desc: Franky e Nami bolam um plano para deter a ira de Chopper, mas ele pode ser letal para a rena! Usopp e Zoro, enfim, conseguem se soltar!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E91
programme.desc: A excessiva bravura de Usopp pode acabar por mat-lo, mas chutes bem conhecidos salvam a vida do atirador.

programme.title: One Piece - S4E92
programme.desc: Sanji apresenta a Jabra o poder flamejante de sua tcnica da Perna do Demnio!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E93
programme.desc: Zoro finalmente desfere o golpe final contra a girafa, mas Luffy ainda precisar passar por Lucci! Franky conseguir alcanar Robin antes que seja tarde demais?!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E94
programme.desc: Zoro lana um golpe de empunhadura nnupla devastador contra seu oponente e Luffy ganha tempo para Franky ativando a Segunda Marcha. Robin no perde as esperanas de viver!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E95
programme.desc: Spandam arrasta Robin para os Portes da Justia, mas a batalha ganha novos rumos com a apario do Rei dos Atiradores!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E96
programme.desc: O confronto de Luffy e Lucci revela os poderosos segredos da Segunda Marcha, e o descuidado Chamado da Destruio de Spandam comea com uma saraivada de tiros de canho!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E97
programme.desc: Uma rvore antiga roubada por um louco com o poder de parar o tempo, e Luffy, Usopp e Sanji caam o culpado para salvar o festival anual da vila!

programme.title: One Piece - S4E98
programme.desc: Nami, Sanji, Usopp, Zoro e demais esto encurralados no tnel inundado, enquanto Luffy mede foras em confronto com Lucci.

programme.title: One Piece - S4E99
programme.desc: O passado sombrio de Rob Lucci mostra o nascimento de um assassino frio dedicado justia a todo custo.

programme.title: One Piece - S4E100
programme.desc: Luffy desfere poderosssimo ataque contra Lucci, e Robin volta ao combate.

programme.title: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E8
programme.desc: A embaixatriz da repblica de Amel, Maira, alvo de uma tentativa de assassinato por seu prprio tio, o ninja Abdad. Jiraiya e Emiha se juntam para defend-la.

programme.title: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E9
programme.desc: Rei Yagyu sequestrada pela Famlia dos Feiticeiro e o resgate exigido a inscrio que revela Pako. Ryu pede ajuda a Toha e os dois traam um plano para resgat-la.

programme.title: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E10
programme.desc: Uma menina oferece uma estranha droga a Manabu e acaba deixando-o internado no hospital. Rei, Ryu e Toha investigam quem est por trs da venda desta droga e chegam a Kanin Dragon, um especialista em kung-fu.

programme.title: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E11
programme.desc: A batalha de Jiraiya com o filho de Chang Kung Fu e Kanin Dragon continua. Reiha revela um misterioso poder csmico.

programme.title: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E12
programme.desc: Toha encontra Mimura, um ex-adversrio de Tetsuzan e desertor dos ninjas Kaminin. Mimura est sendo perseguido pelo cl pois no quer cometer os crimes que os Kaminin praticam. Ele ento pede ajuda famlia Yamashi.

programme.title: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E13
programme.desc: A famlia Yamashi vai a um festival na terra onde nasceu a lenda de Jiraiya, mas logo so atacados por Gyuma, um habilidoso ninja cambojano.

programme.title: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E14
programme.desc: Varias exploses acontecem em diversas fbricas e indstrias do Japo. Bakunin Homem Mssil acusado de ser o responsvel, mas Tetsuzan sabe que no pode ser ele.

programme.title: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E15
programme.desc: O ninja turco Haburamu encontra uma espada macabra em catacumbas na Turquia. Sem querer, ressuscita a ninja bruxa Luana que quer transformar o mundo em um mar de sangue.

programme.title: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E16
programme.desc: A Unidade de Ninjas Especiais da Famlia dos Feiticeiros criada para derrotar Jiraiya definitivamente. Eles so FIre, Water, Tree, Land e Stormin. Ao mesmo tempo Toha recebe do Dr. Smith uma verso mais moderna de seu carro, o Black Storm.

programme.title: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E17
programme.desc: Toha e Manabu fazem uma viagem em busca da diablica armadura Sat que corrompe o esprito do usurio. Tetsuzan teme que algum mal possa estar prximo.

programme.title: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E18
programme.desc: A batalha contra Sat se torna mais intensa. Tetsuzan aparece para ajudar Jiraiya e Agnes. Dokusai trado por Sat e tambm jura vingana.

programme.title: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E19
programme.desc: Dokusai recruta Kenin Parchis, o mestre dos disfarces, justamente quando Tetsuzan est no exterior participando de um torneio. Logo depois um ganancioso corretor de imveis contacta o dojo Togakure.

programme.title: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E20
programme.desc: A Famlia de Feiticeiros vai ao oeste americano e pe a cabea de Jiraiya a prmio. O ninja pistoleiro Rainin Wild sai em busca dessa recompensa.

programme.title: Jiraiya: O Incrvel Ninja - S1E21
programme.desc: Os carros e postos de gasolina da cidade esto tendo seus tanques esvaziados por um estranho dardo chamado Ira da Lua. O responsvel Seinin Alan, um ninja sagrado, protetor da natureza, que est sendo enganado pela Famlia dos Feiticeiros.

programme.title: O Fantstico Jaspion
programme.desc: O grande profeta Edin previu a apario do maligno deus das trevas Satan Goss. Edin convocou Jaspion para defender o Universo e derrotar Satan Goss.

programme.title: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E4

programme.title: O Fantstico Jaspion - S1E5
